articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The top two coins by market cap had suffered seven-day losses of 34% and 36%, respectively, heading into Sunday.
articles.title: Bitcoin Bounces Back Above $20,000, Ethereum Exceeds $1,000

articles.description: As crypto prices bottomed out at 2020 lows, several companies felt the heat more than others. Also: Does crypto’s future not include Bitcoin?

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: The FTX CEO said institutional lines of credit have to be transparent to retail investors.
articles.title: SBF: Three Arrows Crisis ‘Couldn’t Have Happened’ with Transparent On-Chain DeFi

articles.description: As NFT fanatics head to New York for NFT NYC, prices have cooled, but new entrants are buying in. What's the biggest draw: speculation or utility?
articles.title: Bored Ape Yacht Club and the Limitations of NFT Ownership

articles.author: Decrypt Staff
articles.description: Even amid a brutal bear market, a Musk support tweet predictably gives the best-known meme coin a brief price surge.
articles.title: Dogecoin Pumps 8% After Elon Musk Says He's Still Buying

articles.description: A survey of 1,500 U.S. adults showed 57% of households with an avid sports fan have owned digital assets, compared with 24% without one.
articles.title: Sports Fans Twice as Likely to Buy Bitcoin, Ethereum, NFTs

articles.description: After BTC and ETH dropped below key support levels of $20,000 and $1,000 on Saturday morning, the selloff intensified as HODLers await the bottom.
articles.title: Bitcoin Falls Below $18,000, Ethereum Under $900 as Selloff Intensifies

articles.description: The implosion of UST and LUNA vaporized tens of billions of dollars in value.
articles.title: Do Kwon and Terraform Labs Slapped With Class-Action Suit

articles.description: With Hollywood veterans Alec Berg and Mike Judge on board, Terrible Pets will offer NFT-based tools for creating memes and viral content.
articles.title: ‘Silicon Valley’ Producers Tap Ethereum NFTs for User-Generated Comedy

articles.description: The Federal Reserve also introduced the biggest interest rate hike since 1994, and crypto lender Celsius evoked memories of Terra.
articles.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin and Ethereum Crash More Than 30% as Recession Fears Loom

articles.description: The crypto market started the weekend with new lows as Ethereum and Bitcoin fell below key support levels.
articles.title: Bitcoin Breaches $19,000, Ethereum Dips Below $1,000

articles.description: Bitcoin plunged below $20,000 on Saturday morning, a significant support level for the top cryptocurrency. Ethereum approached $1,000.
articles.title: Bitcoin Falls Below $20,000, Ethereum Tests $1,000

articles.description: Special agent said “fraudulent activity is significant” on the business-focused social network.
articles.title: FBI Warns of Cryptocurrency Scammers on LinkedIn

articles.description: Immutable Ventures will offer investment and grants—in IMX tokens and cash—for developers building on its Ethereum scaling solution.
articles.title: Ethereum Layer-2 Immutable X Plots $500M Fund for NFT, Game Developers

articles.description: Gary Vaynerchuk and Avery Akkineni discuss helping Budweiser, Pepsi, and Behr enter and explore the Web3 space.

articles.description: The $2 billion fund has announced that it’s blocking customers from pulling out their assets, after a slump in the cryptocurrency market.
articles.title: Crypto Lending Platform Babel Finance Pauses Withdrawals, Citing ‘Liquidity Pressures’

articles.description: The Grayscale Bitcoin Trust continues to trade at a discount, as the July deadline for its Bitcoin ETF application with the SEC draws ever nearer.
articles.title: GBTC Discount Hits All-Time Low as SEC Bitcoin ETF Decision Looms

articles.description: As Three Arrows Capital struggles, its lenders have started liquidating the firm's positions and portfolio companies are distancing themselves.
articles.title: BitMEX and Others Exiting Three Arrows Capital Amid 3AC Insolvency Fears

articles.description: Nexo managing partner Antoni Trenchev reckons a consolidation of the crypto market is the next step required to overcome current struggles.
articles.title: Nexo Co-Founder: Crypto Crash 'Like Panic of 1907’

articles.description: Martin Shkreli refuted a press release claiming he was launching a DEX to compete with Uniswap—but says he's working on something else in crypto.
articles.title: ‘Pharma Bro’ Martin Shkreli Is Not Launching a DEX—But Says He's Working on Blockchain Software

articles.description: In an effort to reduce exposure to Celsius, MakerDAO has disabled DAI loans using stETH as collateral through the Direct Deposit Module.
articles.title: MakerDAO Votes to Disable Aave DAI Supply, Reducing Celsius Exposure

articles.description: Leading investors in Celsius Network aren’t expected to back the embattled crypto lending company with additional funds.
articles.title: 'Few Are Feeling OK': Celsius Investors Unlikely to Fund Bailout: Report

articles.description: Billionaire Tesla CEO Elon Musk expanded on his plans for Twitter, including crypto payments, in a leaked Q&A session with employees.
articles.title: Elon Musk Reveals Crypto Twitter Plans in Leaked Transcript

articles.description: The bill will now go back to the country’s National Assembly for debate.
articles.title: Panama’s President Vetoes Law That Would Have Regulated Bitcoin, Legalized DAOs

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Solana’s new fee structure could lead to “gas wars” for big NFT drops, but it won’t cause fees to rise across the entire network like on Ethereum.
articles.title: Solana’s New Gas Fees Won’t Make the Network 'Expensive,' Says Co-Founder

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The fake heiress wants to sell NFTs that reportedly grant holders access to her.
articles.title: Convicted Felon Anna Sorokin is Launching an NFT Collection

articles.description: Dogecoin helped get people through the door, and NFTs can serve a similar aim, said Christine Brown, now COO and co-founder of NFT startup Floor.
articles.title: Dogecoin Deserves More Credit for Onboarding People to Crypto: Ex-Robinhood Exec

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Some crypto companies are feeling the crunch of a market crash and reducing their employee headcount to cope—but others are still expanding and securing fresh talent. Here's who's hiring and firing in crypto right now.
articles.title: Who’s Firing—And Still Hiring—During the Bitcoin Bear Market

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: State securities regulators have opened investigations into the crypto lender's decision to freeze accounts, Texas’ enforcement director told Reuters.
articles.title: Regulators in Five States Target Celsius Over Withdrawal Freeze: Report

articles.description: A majority of millionaires polled for the Capgemini World Wealth Report have invested in digital assets including cryptocurrency.
articles.title: Most of the World’s Wealthiest Individuals Have Bought Digital Assets: Capgemini

articles.description: The lawsuit aims to represent a class of people who’ve lost money trading Dogecoin.
articles.title: Elon Musk, Tesla and SpaceX Hit With $258 Billion Dogecoin Lawsuit

articles.description: Thailand’s Securities and Exchange Commission has revoked the Huobi crypto exchange’s operating license in the country.
articles.title: Huobi Shutting Down in Thailand Following Agency Ruling

articles.description: Financial services company Circle today announced the launch of Euro Coin, a brand new stablecoin backed by Euro reserves.
articles.title: Circle Launches Euro-Backed Stablecoin

articles.description: Galaxy Digital CEO Mike Novogratz is cautiously optimistic that Bitcoin will play a key role in the recovery from the current downturn.
articles.title: Mike Novogratz: Bitcoin Will 'Lead the Markets' in Recovery From Fed Rate Hike

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Delo’s recent settlement of $10 million with the CFTC prompted federal authorities to exercise some leniency in sentencing him.
articles.title: BitMEX Co-Founder Benjamin Delo Avoids Prison Time, Receives 30 Months Probation

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Billionaire Shark Tank star Mark Cuban predicts the demise of cryptocurrency projects that don’t have “valid business prospects.”
articles.title: Mark Cuban: Crypto Firms Sustained by 'Cheap, Easy Money' Will Disappear in Crash

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: Top cryptocurrencies Bitcoin and Ethereum posted overnight gains following the Fed's rate hike, amid weakened on-chain user activity.
articles.title: Ethereum Jumps 10% as Bitcoin and Crypto Markets Stage Mini Rally

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Mashinsky touted the strength of the Celsius community but gave no indication as to when customers would again be able to withdraw funds from the crypto lender.
articles.title: Embattled Celsius CEO Alex Mashinsky Breaks 3-Day Silence

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The world's largest NFT marketplace pushes Wyvern overboard, finding safe harbor in Seaport.
articles.title: OpenSea Moves to Seaport Protocol to Cut Ethereum Gas Fees by 35%

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: If two huge loans, which analysts believe belong to Three Arrows, get liquidated, it could be disastrous for crypto lenders and the credit market.
articles.title: Is Multibillion-Dollar Hedge Fund Three Arrows Next to Unravel? Here’s What’s Going On

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin talks to Superchief Gallery co-founder Edward Ed Zipco about NFTs and the potential for digital art at Superchief's 10 anniversary showing in Los Angeles.
articles.title: NFTs and Knife-Throwing Abound at Superchief Gallery in LA

articles.description: From Dolce & Gabbana to Balmain, big names in fashion are embracing crypto and NFTs. Decrypt's Stephen Graves, Dan Roberts, Sander Lutz and contributor Alys Keys discuss the trend.
articles.title: #DecryptLive: Luxury Fashion Brands Are Going Crypto

articles.description: Arcade, an NFT liquidity provider, says it's facilitating $25 million in loans against blue-chip NFTs like Bored Apes. Arcade CEO Gabe Frank talks to Decrypt's Jason Nelson at Consensus 2022.
articles.title: Collateralized Monkey JPEGs: CEO of Arcade Talks to Decrypt at Consensus

articles.description: A dapp is a decentralized app built on blockchains to give you more ownership and freedom in your digital life. Dapps are the next generation of software. Explore the vast selection of dapps on Ethereum today. Curious how to build dapps? Start building free at infura.io.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: What is a Dapp?

articles.description: Neal Stephenson, who coined the term "metaverse" in his seminal novel "Snow Crash," speaks to Decrypt's Jason Nelson along with Bitcoin Foundation founder Peter Vessenes, about the new "free metaverse" they're co-launching, Lamina1.
articles.title: Bringing 'Snow Crash' to Life: Neal Stephenson Talks to Decrypt at Consensus

articles.description: Paul Puey, CEO of Edge Wallet, spoke to Decrypt's Jason Nelson about Edge's announcement of a new "confidential" crypto Mastercard. After Edge announced the card on Wednesday, Mastercard blasted crypto media to say it has nothing to do with the product—despite Puey telling Decrypt, "MasterCard is involved in entire process. They fully approved this, it’s fully legal and approved by MasterCard. It fits entirely within their framework.”
articles.title: Edge CEO Paul Puey Talks 'Confidential' Bitcoin Mastercard Launch

articles.description: Christine Brown left her perch as Robinhood Crypto COO at the end of March to launch a new crypto venture. Now she has announced her new gig: Co-founder and COO at Floor, a token-gated NFT portfolio app that has raised an $8 million seed round. She talked to Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the company's plans, her own crypto and NFT bags, and her outlook on NFTs and on Robinhood.
articles.title: gm: Christine Brown Left Robinhood to Go Full NFT

articles.description: Spencer Dinwiddie's creator token platform Calaxy has raised another $26 million in funding. Dinwiddie tells Decrypt's Stacy Elliott what makes Calaxy stand out and why it can succeed.
articles.title: NBA's Spencer Dinwiddie Talks $26M Raise for Social Crypto App Calaxy

articles.description: Rebecca Lamis, who co-founded UnicornDAO with Nadya Tolokonnikova of the band Pussy Riot, sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson in Justin Aversano's new Quantum Art physical NFT space to discuss diversity and inclusion in Web3.
articles.title: How To Change the 'NFTs Are Bad' Narrative: UnicornDAO Co-Founder Rebecca Lamis

articles.description: Quantum's Justin Aversano sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at the new Quantum Spaces in Santa Monica, CA. Justin discusses the gallery, his new project Doppelganger, and what's next for real-world NFT exhibitions.
articles.title: Twin Flames Creator Justin Aversano Opens Physical NFT Space in LA

articles.description: Shiti Manghani of STEPN, Ty Blackard of NFTY Labs, William Quigley of Wax blockchain, and Spencer Yang of Gomu talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts about how the next era of NFTs will have utility and real-world use cases, as part of CoinMarketCap's The Capital virtual conference.
articles.title: NFTs with Utility: STEPN, NFTY Labs, Wax, and Gomu Predict What's Next

articles.description: Dan Held, a longtime Bitcoin influencer and now head of growth marketing at crypto exchange Kraken, talks to Decrypt's Dan Roberts about Bitcoin maximalists (he calls himself a "mostamalist"), NFTs, and Crypto Winter as part of CoinMarketCap's The Capital virtual conference.
articles.title: Kraken's Dan Held Talks Bitcoin Maximalism and Crypto Winter

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin speaks with Hollywood producer Bryan Unkeless and team members Bryce Anderson and Blaise Hemingway about their Web3 sci-fi project Runner, starting with an NFT project and a comic book all about racing.
articles.title: What Is Runner? 'Hunger Games' Co-Producer's Web3 Sci-Fi Project

articles.description: Decrypt’s Kate Irwin talks to veteran Hollywood film producer Niels Juul about why he’s going all in on NFTs and Web3.
articles.title: ‘The Irishman’ Exec Producer Niels Juul Gets Into NFTs

articles.description: Decrypt's Stephen Graves heads to the 2022 Cannes Film Festival, where he sits down with Leo Matchett of Decentralized Pictures, the Roman Coppola-backed nonprofit using crypto and blockchain voting to find, fund, and produce films.
articles.title: Decrypt at Cannes: Decentralized Pictures CEO Leo Matchett Talks Hollywood Embracing Crypto

articles.description: Decrypt's Stephen Graves is on the scene at the 2022 Cannes Film Festival, where he spoke to Miguel Faus, director of the film "Calladita," who funded his movie by selling NFTs to backers including NounsDAO.
articles.title: Decrypt at Cannes: 'Calladita' Director Miguel Faus on Funding Films with NFTs

articles.description: Episode 10 of the gm podcast: Crypto and sports continue to converge, and one of the best examples is DraftKings. CEO Jason Robins joins Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts to talk about how DraftKings is embracing NFTs as prizes, when the company might accept crypto for entry fees and bets, and how his experience dealing with regulators and lawmakers mirrors what crypto companies are now going through in Washington.
articles.title: gm: DraftKings Goes Crypto
